channel.title: Can't see people after death?
channel.description: I'm using the iClarity source, and yes I'm aware that Prima has released another version where he fixes this. But I'm not sure how to fix it myself, and I've put in heaps of features and don't want to start again.

item.title: Can't see people after death?
item.dc:creator: @skitzoscape skitzoscape
item.description:
@skitzoscape wrote:

But I’m not the one turning invisible, everyone else is. I’ve tested this by multi-logging, killing my other account then teleporting back to Edge, then running back to the wild. The account that was the killer could see the killed account, but the killed account couldn’t see the killer.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 04:17:52 am[/size][hr]Here’s a picture if you can’t understand what I mean.

glitch2.jpg509×549

Read full topic

item.title: Can't see people after death?
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

might be a npc code thats nulled, so when u die it goes invisible. on my server when i die i turn into a ghost but i made it turn bk to human, i didnt like it =|
